verses.verse: And thou<WH1121>, son of man<WH120>, take<WH3947> thee a sharp<WH2299> sword<WH2719>; as a barber<WH1532>'s razor<WH8593> shalt thou take<WH3947> it unto thee<WH5674>, and shalt cause it to pass upon thy head<WH7218> and upon thy beard<WH2206>: then take<WH3947> thee balances<WH3976> to weigh<WH4948>, and divide the hair<WH2505>.

A third part<WH7992> shalt thou burn<WH1197> in the fire<WH217> in the midst<WH8432> of the city<WH5892>, when the days<WH3117> of the siege<WH4692> are fulfilled<WH4390>; and thou shalt take<WH3947> a third part<WH7992>, and smite<WH5221> with the sword<WH2719> round about<WH5439> it<WH7992>; and a third part thou shalt scatter<WH2219> to the wind<WH7307>, and I will draw out<WH7324> a sword<WH2719> after them<WH310>.
And thou shalt take<WH3947> thereof a few<WH4592> in number<WH4557>, and bind<WH6696> them in thy skirts<WH3671>.

And of these again<WH3947> shalt thou take<WH7993>, and cast them into the midst<WH8432> of the fire<WH784>, and burn<WH8313> them in the fire<WH784>; therefrom shall a fire<WH784> come forth<WH3318> into all the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478>.
Thus saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> Jehovah<WH136>: This is Jerusalem<WH3389>; I have set<WH7760> her in the midst<WH8432> of the nations<WH1471>, and countries<WH776> are round about her<WH5439>.

And she hath rebelled<WH4784> against mine ordinances<WH4941> in doing wickedness<WH7564> more than the nations<WH1471>, and against my statutes<WH2708> more than the countries<WH776> that are round about<WH5439> her<WH3988>; for they have rejected mine ordinances<WH4941>, and as for my statutes<WH2708>, they have not walked in them<WH1980>.

Therefore thus saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> Jehovah<WH3069>: Because ye are turbulent<WH1995> more than the nations<WH1471> that are round about<WH5439> you<WH1980>, and have not walked in my statutes<WH2708>, neither have kept<WH6213> mine ordinances<WH4941>, neither have done<WH6213> after the ordinances<WH4941> of the nations<WH1471> that are round about you<WH5439>;

therefore thus saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> Jehovah<WH136>: Behold<WH6213>, I, even I, am against thee; and I will execute judgments<WH4941> in the midst<WH8432> of thee in the sight<WH5869> of the nations<WH1471>.
And I will do<WH6213> in thee that which I have not done<WH6213>, and whereunto I will not do<WH6213> any more the like<WH3282>, because of all thine abominations<WH8441>.

Therefore the fathers<WH1> shall eat<WH398> the sons<WH1121> in the midst<WH8432> of thee<WH1121>, and the sons shall eat<WH398> their fathers<WH1>; and I will execute<WH6213> judgments<WH8201> on thee<WH7611>; and the whole remnant of thee will I scatter<WH2219> unto all the winds<WH7307>.

Wherefore <WH2416>, as I live, saith<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> Jehovah<WH136>, surely<WH2930>, because thou hast defiled my sanctuary<WH4720> with all thy detestable things<WH8251>, and with all thine abominations<WH8441>, therefore will I also diminish<WH1639> thee<WH5869>; neither shall mine eye spare<WH2347>, and I also will have no pity<WH2550>.

A third part<WH7992> of thee shall die<WH4191> with the pestilence<WH1698>, and with famine<WH7458> shall they be consumed<WH3615> in the midst<WH8432> of thee<WH7992>; and a third part shall fall<WH5307> by the sword<WH2719> round about<WH5439> thee<WH7992>; and a third part I will scatter<WH2219> unto all the winds<WH7307>, and will draw out<WH7324> a sword<WH2719> after them<WH310>.

Thus shall mine anger<WH639> be accomplished<WH3615>, and I will cause my wrath<WH2534> toward them to rest<WH5117>, and I shall be comforted<WH5162>; and they shall know<WH3045> that I<WH3068>, Jehovah, have spoken<WH1696> in my zeal<WH7068>, when I have accomplished<WH3615> my wrath upon them<WH2534>.
Moreover I will make<WH5414> thee a desolation<WH2723> and a reproach<WH2781> among the nations<WH1471> that are round about<WH5439> thee<WH5869>, in the sight of all that pass by<WH5674>.

So it shall be a reproach<WH2781> and a taunt<WH1422>, an instruction<WH4148> and an astonishment<WH4923>, unto the nations<WH1471> that are round about<WH5439> thee<WH6213>, when I shall execute judgments<WH8201> on thee in anger<WH639> and in wrath<WH2534>, and in wrathful<WH2534> rebukes<WH8433>; (I<WH3068>, Jehovah, have spoken it<WH1696>;)

when I shall send<WH7971> upon them the evil<WH7451> arrows<WH2671> of famine<WH7458>, that are for destruction<WH4889>, which I will send<WH7971> to destroy<WH7843> you<WH3254>: and I will increase the famine<WH7458> upon you<WH7665>, and will break your staff<WH4294> of bread<WH3899>;

and I will send<WH7971> upon you famine<WH7458> and evil<WH7451> beasts<WH2416>, and they shall bereave<WH7921> thee<WH1698>; and pestilence and blood<WH1818> shall pass through<WH5674> thee<WH935>; and I will bring the sword<WH2719> upon thee<WH3068>: I, Jehovah, have spoken it<WH1696>.
